The quote attributed to Priyanka Chaturv: Alt News contacted the Congress spokesperson who confirmed that the quote was not made by her.
The Facebook page: मिशन 400+ (साथ है तो अभी जुड़े)' had shared the post with the fake quote, which received 4,000 shares.
